Exciting news! Beginning today, customers can purchase the new Coach Prime Motorola Mobility (a Lenovo Company) razr exclusively at boostmobile.com/prime or in Boost Mobile stores, while supplies last! Plus, all Boost customers who purchase the new signature Coach Prime motorola razr within the first month of its availability will be entered to win a surprise phone call from Coach Prime! Hurry to your closest Boost Mobile store to purchase the device and get the chance to recieve inspiration directly from the legend, himself. Visit boostmobile.com/stores to find your nearest location. Now let‚Äôs #GetAfterIt.

Today is a huge day for #BoostNation. At Boost Mobile, we‚Äôve always been about empowering people and their communities. We have partnered with Deion ‚ÄúCoach Prime‚Äù Sanders. Coach Prime‚Äôs sports career speaks volumes, but it's his off-field persona that truly sets him apart. Coach Prime isn‚Äôt just a name; he‚Äôs a community champ, and a guy who knows how to win. Like Boost Mobile, Coach Prime is a challenger at heart and continues to strive for excellence which makes him a great fit for us. Together, we‚Äôre introducing the Boost Mobile Coach Prime motorola razr. Coming soon to your nearest Boost Mobile store. Learn more at boostmobile.com/prime. Now let‚Äôs #GetAfterIt.
